name: Slasher's Keep
description: Hack, slash, shoot and loot your way through procedurally generated dungeons! Smack your enemies into spikes with your inventory sack!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ 32bit Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 460 or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ 64bit Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 770 or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2500 MB available space
